title: raara nannElukO raa
sahitya:
rArA nannElukOrA shrI raghuvIra nannEca mErA

anupallavi

 sArasAra udAra akhilAdhAra adbhUtaguNa dhArALamuga

caraNam 1

 dhArA dharAbha sharIra nAyeDa nIvu nEramennaka yAdukOra shrI rAma
samsAra kAnana vihAruDaina nAku sharamau nAmamE tAraka maura
   
caraNam 2

 sItA hrt-kamala khadyOptAjana pArijAtA ghananidhi pOtabja 
hitakula jAtarakSincu vidhAta janaka iSTa dAtavaina sAkEtagArA
   
caraNam 3

 rA jAgEla dharajAmAtavaina jAlerigi O Ajnubahuda 
virAjamAna dvija rAjAnana sura rAjArcita tyAgarAja nutAja
